user_input.original_text: 需要一套宿舍管理系统，具体需求如下：1. 有一个全局的宿舍管理员，可以指定用户为宿舍长 2. 管理员可以创建宿舍，每个宿舍有4~6个床位 3. 管理员可以分配用户到宿舍，每个用户只能被分配到一个宿舍的一个床位上 4. 需要一些常见的用户行为扣分规则，扣分到一定程度后，宿舍长可以申请踢出某个用户。5. 管理员同意了踢出申请，用户就被踢出了。

identified_goals.title: Manage dormitory facilities and space allocation
identified_goals.description: Effectively manage physical dormitory spaces, bed assignments, and occupancy to optimize living arrangements for students

identified_goals.title: Maintain dormitory discipline and behavior standards
identified_goals.description: Establish and enforce behavioral standards in dormitories to maintain a conducive living and learning environment

identified_goals.title: Enable distributed dormitory management hierarchy
identified_goals.description: Create an effective management structure with global administrators and local dormitory leaders to ensure proper oversight at all levels

identified_goals.title: Handle disciplinary escalation and conflict resolution
identified_goals.description: Provide mechanisms to address severe behavioral issues through structured escalation processes when local management is insufficient
